projects.Title: CMS System
projects.Description: A custom CMS built using PHP, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript for efficient content management and responsive design.

projects.Title: Ecommerce Websit
projects.Description: An Eommerce website built with PHP, Laravel, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript for seamless online shopping experience.

projects.Title: KiloHealth Website

projects.Title: KiloBlood App
projects.Description: Working with a team to create the KiloBlood website using Java Spring Boot API, focusing on the Category feature.

projects.Title: ABA Guideline
projects.Description: Developed with a group for a school assignment using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create the ABA guideline.

projects.Title: SabayNews Design
projects.Description: Designed the SabayNews website using HTML and CSS for an appealing, responsive layout focused on news presentation.

projects.Title: Computer Store
projects.Description: Developed a website for a computer store using HTML and CSS, focusing on product display and navigation.

projects.Title: BookStore Design
projects.Description: Created an attractive and functional design for a bookshop website using HTML and CSS, emphasizing user-friendly navigation.

projects.Title: Portfolio Website
projects.Description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React JS, TailwindCSS, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for an interactive design.
